Module Simple PI¶

PI-controller based on Yanakiev and Kanellakopoulos: “Nonlinear Spacing Policies for Automated Heavy-Duty Vehicles”.

class acc_pi.PIController(simulation_param, acc_vehicle_param, acc_param)[source]¶

Bases: acc.acc_interface.AccFactory

acc_control(v_lead, v_acc, s_x_lead, s_x_acc, a_acc)[source]¶

Calculates the ACC vehicle input based on the PI-controller ACC

Parameters

  • v_lead (float) – current velocity of leading vehicle [m/s]

  • v_acc (float) – current velocity of ACC vehicle [m/s]

  • s_x_lead (float) – x-position at the leading’s vehicle rear [m]

  • s_x_acc (float) – x-position at the ACC vehicle’s front [m]

  • a_acc (float) – current acceleration of the ACC vehicle [m/s²]

Return type

float

Returns

calculated acceleration [m/s²]

dynamic_headway(delta_v)[source]¶

Calculates time-headway between two vehicles

Parameters

delta_v (float) – relative velocity between leading and following vehicle [m/s]

Return type

float

Returns

time-headway for acceleration calculation [s]
